channel.title: CVE Feed for Automattic -- WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Automattic -- WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-31111|2024-06-25T12:54:47.977Z -- automattic -- wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Automattic WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WordPress: from 6.5 through 6.5.4, from 6.4 through 6.4.4, from 6.3 through 6.3.4, from 6.2 through 6.2.5, from 6.1 through 6.1.6, from 6.0 through 6.0.8, from 5.9 through 5.9.9.
